topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55628a7d63687252d2480500#post_55628a7d63687252d2480500
[bq="SquiggyBomb"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55628a0863687248c3fa0b00#post_55628a0863687248c3fa0b00
Hey man, hunters aren't bad guys. Hell I'm friends with a lot of them. This preconceived notion of them being violent hicks is bullshit. They're actually some of the kindest dudes you'll meet.[/bq]
Actually hunting is required for some species; if deer overpopulate then they start to starve cause of lack of food.

There is such a thing as conservationist hunting also.
